name: Cracker Barrel Peg Game
description:
HOW TO PLAY:

Click a peg character to select it, and then click an empty hole to move the peg there. The selected peg can only move to a hole if there's another peg between itself and the target hole. A successful move eliminates the peg that the selected peg passed over.

You win if you can eliminate all pegs but one from the board.

--------------------------------------------

This was originally done as a coding test for a game studio a long time ago, but I still occasionally boot it up to play it and see if I can remember how to beat it. So I figured why not upload it ¯\_(ツ)_/¯
